archimate:Requirement.name: 4.53.5 Email scanning control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Email messages should be scanned for: attachments that could contain malicious code (e.g. malicious code hid-den in self-extracting zip files, Adobe PDF documents or embedded mac-ros) prohibited words or phrases (e.g. those that are racist, offensive, libel-lous or obscene) phrases associated with malware (e.g. those commonly used in phish-ing, hoax viruses or chain letters).
